name: FragmentTransactionExtended
description: FragmentTransactionExtended is a library which provide us a set of custom animations between fragments.

name: google-music-mock
description: An attempt to implement the Material animations demonstrated in Google's Material design guideline: http://www.google.com/design/spec/animation/meaningful-transitions.html#meaningful-transitions-visual-continuity
